column5: Hey guys. Looking forward to another season of fishing! Its only a mater of time now! In the meantime? I wanted to try for some smelts. The last time I went, my friends forgot my net and everything! I went to get the car and they loaded everything but my stuff!!  Anyways, I want to buy another 6 ft thingy with the net. Does anyone know where I can buy one in Toronto? I think I checked last year at BPS and they didn't have any.  Also I'd like to know if anyone has any word if the smelts are running. If so? PM me.

I think lebaron has them,or try tightlines in pickering,and oh ya,canadian tire used to sell smelt nets,im sure they would still have them,and they should be starting in a few weeks,but the lake temps are still alittle bit behind so im not sure if that will delay them for a week or so,i will look into it and if i find out i will give you a shout !!!!     cheers
I don't think I ever seen them in Canadian Tire but will give it a more better look.Lebaron? I'll give em a shout and see what happens. Thanks! I appreciate it!
They are just starting here in North Bay, a buddy of mine went last night but I haven't heard how he did yet. I will let you know when I hear from him.
Great! I think they start up there and then move south? So I think I may have to wait another week? I might go check it out anyways. Thanks for the heads up!
I'm not sure how it works, I've never been but I will keep you posted on how he does.
